review: Set up was simple.  Started using it right away. So far, works beautifully .
author: Henry Williams "Jaloux"

review: I'm giving up cable. I get so much more from Amazon Fire TV it's so unbelievable. I wish I could get local new broadcast but other than that I'm getting my entertainment fill. From Music to movies.
author: Joe Huffman

review: Was exactly as described and arrived within a week. Very happy with this!
author: Shannon S

review: This was very easy to set up and use.
author: Patricia

review: I love love love love my Fire Stick.  Easy to install  Easy to use.  So many prime members selections.  The price is great too.
author: Elizabeth Groseth

review: I loved it.I did not watch any of the movies that we brought on our vacation and never turned on normal broadcast. We watched just the Fire Stick. I will be purchasing one, for future use as I have a 2 year old toddler and this came in real handy for her.ThanksChristine Crear
author: Christine Crerar
